几种脚本语言速度比较

几种脚本语言速度比较

我想试试Lisp, Python, awk这些语言那个最快.

自幂数定义如下: $$! a^{n}+b^{n}+\dots+x^{n}=ab\dots x$$

Lisp的代码:

(defun nar (number)
      (let ((numlen (spn number))
              (smq 0)
              (num number) (k 0))
         (dotimes (i numlen)
                        (setf k (mod num 10)
                                smq (+ smq (expt k numlen))
                                num (floor (/ num 10.0))))
         (= number smq)))
(time (do ((p (selfNms 150) (selfNms (1+ p))))
         ((&gt; p 1000000))
       (format t "~d  " p)))

得承认，我这个Lisp的代码写的太烂了。或许就是这个原因影响了它的速度。

Python的代码:

- coding: utf-8 -
def shuxian(nu):
    if nu &lt; 150:
        return False
    else:
        idx = len(str(nu))
        shu = 0
        m = nu
        while m &gt; 0:
            k = m%10
            shu += (k ** idx)
            m=m/10
    if shu!=nu:
        return False
    else:
        return True

import time 

begin = time.time()
print [x for x in range(1000000) if shuxian(x)]
print "用时:%s秒"%(time.time()-begin)

awk的代码:

function ispn(x)
{
    x = int(x)
    nl = int(log(x)/log(10))+1
    n = x
    s = 0
    while (n &gt; 0)
    {
        k = n%10
        s += k**nl
        n = int(n/10)
    }
    if (s == x)
        return (x)
    else
        return 0
}
{
    for ( y = $1; y &lt;= $2; y++)
        if (ispn(y)!=0)
        {
            g = ispn(y)
            print g
        }
}

time echo 150 1000000 | awk -f /tmp/test.awk

C语言的代码:

#include "stdio.h"
#include "math.h"
#include "time.h"
int main()
{
  unsigned long fr,to,n,m,k,sum;
  int nLog,numlen,brPoint = 1;
  printf("Input Number Range ('from' 'to'):");
  scanf("%lu %lu",&amp;fr,&amp;to);
  float c_start,c_end;
  c<em>start = clock();
  for(n=fr;n &lt;= to;n++)
    {
      nLog = log10(n);
      numlen = floor(nLog)+1;
      m=n;
      sum=0;
      while(m&gt;0)
        {
          k=m % 10;
          sum += pow(k,numlen);
          m= m/10;
        }
     if(sum==n)
       {
         printf("%12lu",n);
         if(brPoint%5==0)
           {printf("\n");
             brPoint = 0;
           }
         brPoint++;
       }
    }
  printf("\n");
  c_end =clock();
  printf("Usage time = %fs.\n",difftime(c_end,c_start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
  return 0;
}

结果:

计算150-1000000间自幂数耗时比较
语言耗时 (秒)
c0.560000
python1.87891507149
Lisp2.450000
awk2.982000
